title: Shadow Kayn is beastly right now
body:
Tons of damage and the 70 percent move speed through walls gives him an insane chase game.

Now picking between the two forms is more of a real choice

replies.body:
im almost getting tired of saying this. the problem isnt the c hampion himself. the problem is that ADCs outclass him by building lethality and just 1-2 shotting everything from a range anywhere between 550 and 760.

also his ult is LITERALLY just a wattered down shit version of zeds ult.  basically its zeds ult if all he did was ult and AAed someone and without the ability to return to his shadow...
shadow sucks atm, drakin is the only good Kayn at the moment unless you are playing against a team that has no tanks on it

that the point... with his passive its insane...

but even without it his W deal plenty damage
